default.description: Use as the primary background for the UI.

pressed.description: Use as the primary background for the UI.

default.description: Use for the background of actionable cards.

pressed.description: Use for the background of actionable cards.

default.description: Use for the background of actionable cards.

pressed.description: Use for the background of actionable cards.

default.description: Primary text, such as body copy, sentence case headers, and buttons.

subtle.description: Secondary text, such as navigation, subtle button links, input field labels, and all caps subheadings.

subtlest.description: Meta-data, breadcrumbs, input field placeholder and helper text.

selected.description: Use for text in selected or opened states, such as tabs and dropdown buttons

disabled.description: Use for text in a disabled state.

default.description: Use to visually group or separate UI elements, such as flat cards or side panel dividers.

input.description: Use for borders of form UI elements, such as text fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons.

disabled.description: Use for borders of elements in a disabled state.

focused.description: Use for focus rings of elements in a focus state.

inverse.description: Use to visually group or separate UI elements, such as flat cards or side panel dividers.

elevated.description: Use to visually group or separate UI elements, such as flat cards or side panel dividers.

150.description: Default UI paddings. Use it for containers with title: such cards, list item.

200.description: Vertical paddings for components without title.

250.description: Vertical paddings for components without title.

H200.description:
Content utility Headers. 
Such as Section / Card titles.

H300.description: Headers in small components where space is limited.

default.description: Use in short descriptions or labels. The default size for text in components.
